response: "wow, did you know that many companies share your personal information without your consent? 😱 it's like, what even is the point of having privacy settings if they're just gonna ignore them? 🤷‍♂️ i mean, i get it, data is money, but come on, can't we have some control over our own lives? 😩 #datenschutz #privatsphäre #security"
